Connector Compatibility

Hirose Compatible Connectors

Hirose-compatible DF series and other popular connector families for automotive, industrial, and computer applications.

DF Series Compatible

The DF series is one of Hirose's most popular wire-to-board connector families, widely used in automotive and industrial applications.

Pitch Options
1.5mm - 2.5mm
Current Rating
2-3A
Voltage Rating
250V AC/DC

Applications

Automotive

  • • ECU connections
  • • Sensor harnesses
  • • Interior electronics

Industrial

  • • Factory automation
  • • Control systems
  • • PLC I/O

Computer

  • • Power supplies
  • • Motherboard headers
  • • Internal cabling
